name: eslint-watcher
description: Watches selected files in your repo for new saves and runs ESLint in its own terminal when it sees a save.

scripts.postinstall: node scripts/setup.js || (echo 'Automated setup failed. Please run `npm run setup` manually in your project directory to complete the setup. This command will install ESLint if not already installed, create or update .eslintrc.js with default ESLint configurations, and set up a Visual Studio Code task for ESLint Watcher.' && exit 1)

author: Todd DeMelle
